contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of December, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The Order of the Superior Court is VACATED and this matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court to address Petitioner’s third claim. See Commonwealth v. Laboy, 594 Pa. 411, 936 A.2d 1058, 2007 WL 4163852 (2007).
